text: @GavinNewsom You’ve largely ignored COVID19 since May 26, up until the anarchist madness ran a bit out of steam in the last couple of weeks. Now you want to turn the COVID19 fear-switch button on again. Sorry, you cried wolf, one too many times, privileged white boy! Tne onus will be on you!
